eval(t)¶

Evaluates this Arc and returns a Point. :param t: Normalized value between 0 and 1 :type t: float :result: a Point on the Arc. :rtype: Point

eval_pln(t)¶

Evaluates this Arc and returns a Plane. :param t: Normalized value between 0 and 1 :type t: float :result: a Plane on the Arc. :rtype: Plane
